title: Construction of proposed buildings for Faculty of Engineering at Ariviyal Nagar Killinochchi - University of Jaffna
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to award the above contract to the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder at a cost of Rs.1,504 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
